statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({8.03}+{8.86}\right)}={33.78}\approx{33.78}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.86}\cdot{7.55}={66.893}\approx{66.9}.
